## SavedObjectsType.deleteOnUpgrade property

If defined, allows a type to run a search query and return a query filter that may match any documents which may be excluded from the next migration upgrade process. Useful for cleaning up old documents which are no longer needed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deleteOnUpgrade?: SavedObjectTypeExcludeFromUpgradeFilterHook;
```
